english: He would dearly love to see his mother again .
chinese: 他极想再见到他的母亲。

english: Goodbye. so pleased to have met you .
chinese: 再见！见到你实在叫人高兴。

english: He bade her good-bye and left .
chinese: 他对她说了一声“再见”就走开了。

english: Mr. wang . let us go now . goodbye .
They yelled their goodbyes as the bus left .
chinese: 汽车开动时，他们大喊再见再见。
再见造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I haven't clapped eyes on him since 1950 .
chinese: 我从1950年以后就没有再见到过他。

english: We are so much looking forward to seeing you again .
chinese: 我们非常盼望再见到你。

english: I'd like to speak to you again. bye now .
chinese: 我希望和你再次谈一谈，现在再见吧。

english: Are we to have the pleasure of seeing you again ?
chinese: 我们是不是有福气再见到你？

english: I knew i should see her again at some time .
chinese: 我知道，有朝一日我总会再见到她。

english: Yes , of course , i will come on time . see you again .
It is like we shall see him no more .
He popped his head round the door to say goodbye .
chinese: 他从门口探进头来说了声再见。

english: I will let you know as soon as they come . goodbye .
chinese: 他们一来，我就告诉你。再见。

english: She left without so much as saying “ good bye ” .
chinese: 她甚至连“再见”都没说就走了。
